gen:link.msg:message: De datum gerapporteerd voor `SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate` BEHOORT te liggen voor, of gelijk zijn aan, de huidige datum. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DirectorReasonNoSignature` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DirectorReasonNoSignature')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DirectorReasonNoSignature return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DirectorReasonNoSignature` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence3_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence3_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`DirectorSignedStatus` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen.

`SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsDate` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence1_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence1_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsLocation` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsLocation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsLocation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SignatureManagingSupervisoryDirectorsLocation` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DirectorSignedStatus` gelijk is aan `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence2_DirectorSignedStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_SigningFinancialStatements_PrtValueThnExistence2_DirectorSignedStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
